        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>2121</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Tyngdepunkt</string>
            <string language="en">centre of gravity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerpunkt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">centre de la gravité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">centro de gravidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">centro di gravità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κέντρο βάρους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">centro de gravedad</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Hvor er tyngdepunktet? Hvordan varierer dette ved plassering og vekt?</string>
            <string language="en">Where is the centre of gravity ? How does placement and weight affect it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">tyngdepunkt</string>
            <string language="en">centre of gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">balanse</string>
            <string language="en">balance</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wo ist der Schwerpunkt? Wie beeinflußt 
Plazierung und Gewicht ihn?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Où est le centre de la gravité ? Comment 
le placement et le poids l'affecte-t-ils ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Onde é o centro da gravidade? Como a 
colocação e o peso o afetam?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dove è il centro di gravità? Come la 
disposizione ed il peso lo interessa?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πού είναι το κέντρο βάρους; Πώς η τοποθέτηση 
και το βάρος έχουν επιπτώσεις σε τον;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Dónde está el centro de gravedad? ¿Cómo
la colocación y el peso lo afecta?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerpunkt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Balance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
